"type": "application/json", "cmei18n": "zh-Hans zh-CN zh", "cmei18n-namespace": "core", "text": "{ "readme": [ "如想了解更多，请关注我们的[[GitHub Repo|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced]]。", "", "为TiddlyWiki的CodeMirror编辑器提供一个灵活而丰富的扩展框架(包括高亮、补全、预览等功能)，任何人都可以使用此框架为编辑器编写扩展插件！目前基于此框架实现的功能有：", "", "* TiddlyWiki5(`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`)语法高亮；", "* Wiki链接自动提示；", "* Tiddler预览；", "* 可点击链接；", "", "更多功能正在开发中，欢迎你的加入！" ], "control-panel": { "language": { "title": "当前插件所使用的语言", "description": [ "选择适合你的语言，`system`代表跟随系统偏好。", "如果没有适合你的语言，请在[[Issue|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/issues]]中提出，欢迎任何人贡献代码！" ] }, "realtime-hint": { "title": "实时代码补全", "description": "无需Ctrl+Space，像VSCode一样，在输入时实时进行补全提示(现只支持WikiLink)。", "button-on": "实时代码补全已开启", "button-off": "实时代码补全已关闭" }, "clickable-links": { "title": "可点击的链接", "description": "WikiLinks和URL是否可以点击。", "button-on": "可点击链接已开启", "button-off": "可点击链接补全已关闭" }, "hint-preview": { "title": "补全时预览", "description": "自动补全时，根据所选建议条目，在补全框右侧弹出小的文档/预览框。", "button-on": "补全时预览已开启", "button-off": "补全时预览已关闭" } }, "tw-snippet": { "blockquoteSingleline": { "name": "单行块引用", "preview": "!! 单行块引用\n> 引用的文本\n> 另一行引号文本\n!! 你也可以像这样嵌套引号\n> 一个引文\n>> 一个副引文\n> 另一个引文\n!! 你也可以将块状引号与其他列表项混合\n* 清单一\n** 清单二\n**> 一个引文\n**> 另一个引文\n*清单三" }, "blockquote": { "name": "块引用", "preview": "!! 多行块引用\n\n<<<\n这是一个块引用段落\n\n写了两行中文\n<<<" }, "blockquoteWithCSSClass": { "name": "带CSS类的块引用", "preview": "!! CSS 类也可以加到引用里\n\n<<<.tc-big-quote\n一个戏剧性的引用\n<<< 一个重要的人" }, "blockquoteCitation": { "name": "带引文来源的块引用", "preview": "!! 一个引文来源也可以加到引用里\n\n<<<\n计算机就像我们思想的自行车\n<<< 史蒂夫-乔布斯" }, "codeblock": { "name": "代码块", "preview": "!! 你可以使用三个反斜线```来标记代码块\n\n```\n这将是以等宽字体显示的。\n```\n\n为了正确显示，这三个反斜线需要在行的开头，并紧跟一个换行。\n\n请注意，任何前面的段落内容也应该用双倍的换行符来适当终止。因此，下面这个例子是错误的。\n
\n这是一个普通的段落\n```\n这将是以等宽字体显示的。\n```\n
\n\n正确的版本是。\n
\n这是一个普通的段落\n\n```\n这将是以等宽字体显示的。\n```\n
\n\n注意，有些键盘布局将反斜线视为[[死键|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_key]]，使其难以输入。诀窍是输入三个反斜线，然后是一个空格。或者，一次性输入所有六个回车键，然后是一个空格，然后将光标向后移动三个字符来输入或粘贴内容。\n\n" }, "image": { "name": "图片", "preview": "!! 插入图片\n\n[img[$:/favicon.ico]]" }, "center": { "name": "居中", "preview": "!! 居中元素\n\n
就像这样
" } } } "}, "$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/en-GB.json": {"title": "$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/en-GB.json", "type": "application/json", "cmei18n": "en-GB en default", "cmei18n-namespace": "core", "text": "{ "readme": [ "View more on [[GitHub Repo|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced]].", "", "CodeMirror editor for TiddlyWiki provides a flexible and rich extension framework (including highlighting, completion, preview and other features), anyone can use this framework to write extension plug-ins for the editor! Currently based on this framework to achieve the following features.", "", "* TiddlyWiki5 (`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`) syntax highlighting.", "* Wiki link auto-tip; * Tiddler preview; * TiddlyWiki5 (`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`)", "* Tiddler preview; * Tiddler preview.", "* Clickable links.", "", "More features are in development, welcome to join!" ], "control-panel": { "language": { "title": "Current language used by the plugin", "description": [ "Choose the language that suits you, `system` stands for follow the system preference.", "If there is no language that suits you, please ask in [[Issue|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/issues]], anyone is welcome to contribute code!" ] }, "realtime-hint": { "title": "Realtime-hint when typing", "description": "Real-time code completion hints like VSCode while typing (currently only ~WikiLink completion is implemented) and no need to activate with Ctrl+Space.", "button-on": "Real-time code completion is enabled", "button-off": "Real-time code completion is disabled" }, "clickable-links": { "title": "Clickable links", "description": "Whethere WikiLinks and URLs are clickable.", "button-on": "Clickable links is enabled", "button-off": "Clickable links is disabled" }, "hint-preview": { "title": "Hint preview", "description": "When auto-completion is performed, a small document/preview box pops up to the right of the completion box based on the selected suggestion entry.", "button-on": "Hint preview is enabled", "button-off": "Hint preview is disabled" } }, "tw-snippet": { "blockquoteSingleline": { "name": "single line blockquote", "preview": "!! Single-line Block Quotes\n\n> Quoted text\n> Another line of quoted text\n\n!! You can also nest quotes like this:\n\n> A top quote\n>> A subquote\n> Another top quote\n\n!! You can also mix block quotes with other list items. For example:\n\n* List One\n** List Two\n**> A quote\n**> Another quote\n* List Three" }, "blockquote": { "name": "blockquote", "preview": "!! Multi-line block quotes\n\n<<<\nThis is a block quoted paragraph\n\nwritten in English\n<<<" }, "blockquoteWithCSSClass": { "name": "blockquoteWithCSSClass", "preview": "!! CSS classes can be added to a block quote\n\n<<<.tc-big-quote\nA dramatic quote\n<<< Somebody Important" }, "blockquoteCitation": { "name": "blockquoteCitation", "preview": "!! A citation can be added to the quote like this\n\n<<<\nComputers are like a bicycle for our minds\n<<< Steve Jobs" }, "codeblock": { "name": "codeblock", "preview": "!! You can use triple backticks ``` to mark code blocks\n\n```\nThis will be monospaced\n```\n\nTo be interpreted correctly, the three backticks need to be at the start of the line and immediately followed by a line-break.\n\nBe aware that any preceding paragraph content should be properly terminated with a double line break, too. So, this example is wrong:\n\n
\nThis is an ordinary paragraph\n```\nThis will be monospaced\n```\n
\n\nThe correct version is:\n\n
\nThis is an ordinary paragraph\n\n```\nThis will be monospaced\n```\n
\n\nNote that some keyboard layouts treat the backtick as a [[dead key|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_key]], making it hard to type. The trick is to type three backticks followed by a space. Alternatively, type all six backticks in one go, then a space, and then move the cursor back three characters to type or paste the content.\n\n" }, "image": { "name": "image", "preview": "!! Insert a image.\n\n[img[$:/favicon.ico]]" }, "center": { "name": "center", "preview": "!! Centralize elements.\n\n
like this
" } } } "}}}
